Write a story about a dog who was so well-behaved and obedient that he never barked, even when he was in danger.
Create a poem about a dog who was so quiet that he went unnoticed until he was old and passed away.
Write a play about a dog who was so loyal that he never barked, even when he was betrayed by his owner.
Create a meme about a dog who was so quiet that he was mistaken for a stuffed animal.
Write a short story about a dog who was so well-behaved that he was able to keep his owner's secrets and never barked about them.
